name: Damn Endless Orcs
description:
History

In a cold night on the isle of Borgakh, native land of the mighty orcs, a wizard named Ogrul,
studying the art of dark and ancient magic, becomes capable of summoning portals to the human
world. After ravaging their lands, the orcs needed someplace else to supply the needs of their
people, that grows exponentialy, it was when Ogrul offered a solution. But he was not counting
with the valiant and brave heroes the humans gathered togheter.
You are one of the brave heroes that was recruited to fight the endless waves of orcs that come
through the portals, fight hard and brave to maintain the humans way of life!

Tower Defense

At the start of each wave the orcs advance to destroy the city gate, use different kinds of turrets to defend the city!

Survival Mode

At the start of each wave 8 portals are opened in random locations, the waves are increasingly
difficult, with each posing a new challenge for you and your friends. You must survive and defeat
all of the orcs.

Enemies


Battle against various types of orcs, each one with its own way of ending the human race.

  • Minion
  • Grunt
  • Warlock
  • Head Hunter
  • Hog Rider
  • Berseker
  • Golem

Items/h2]
The game contains a crafting system for you to unlock more powerful equipment, altogheter
there are 40 diferent items for you to conquer.

Progression

Level up your hero to unlock different items and new items to craft, become more powerful by
increasing your stats and survive enormous waves of enemies, gain points for your bravery and
become the number 1 hero of earth! All this alone or together with friends!
